First, the code structure:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    // Read first part's input
    int n, x;
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &x);
    int *a = (int*)malloc(n * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    }

    // Compute first part's m
    int **b = (int**)malloc(n * sizeof(int*));
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        b[i] = (int*)malloc(n * sizeof(int));
    }

    long long min_val = 1e18; // Use a large value
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int m = a[i];
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            int k = i - j;
            if (k < 0) k += n;
            m = (m < a[k]) ? m : a[k];
            b[j][i] = m;
        }
    }

    // Compute the minimum value
    min_val = 1e18;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int sum_row = 0;
        for (int col = 0; col < n; col++) {
            sum_row += b[i][col];
        }
        long long current = (long long)sum_row + (long long)x * i;
        if (current < min_val) {
            min_val = current;
        }
    }

    // Free the b arrays
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        free(b[i]);
    }
    free(b);

    // Convert min_val to string S
    char s[20];
    sprintf(s, "%lld", min_val);

    // Process second part
    int len = strlen(s);
    long long mod = 1000000007;
    long long result;
    if (len == 1) {
        char c = s[0];
        if (c == '5' || c == '?') {
            result = 1;
        } else {
            result = 0;
        }
    } else {
        int dp[len][13];
        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < 13; j++) {
                dp[i][j] = 0;
            }
        }

        // Initialize first character
        char c0 = s[0];
        if (c0 != '?') {
            int digit = c0 - '0';
            dp[0][digit] = 1;
        } else {
            for (int d = 0; d < 10; d++) {
                dp[0][d] = 1;
            }
        }

        // Process remaining characters
        for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) {
            char c = s[i];
            if (c != '?') {
                int digit = c - '0';
                for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
                    if (dp[i-1][k] == 0) continue;
                    int new_mod = (k * 10 + digit) % 13;
                    dp[i][new_mod] = (dp[i][new_mod] + dp[i-1][k]) % mod;
                }
            } else {
                for (int d = 0; d < 10; d++) {
                    for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
                        if (dp[i-1][k] == 0) continue;
                        int new_mod = (k * 10 + d) % 13;
                        dp[i][new_mod] = (dp[i][new_mod] + dp[i-1][k]) % mod;
                    }
                }
            }
            // Apply mod to all entries (though the above steps already mod)
            for (int k = 0; k < 13; k++) {
                dp[i][k] %= mod;
            }
        }
        result = dp[len-1][5] % mod;
    }

    // Process third part
    char res_str[25];
    sprintf(res_str, "%lld", result);
    for (char *p = res_str; *p != '\0'; p++) {
        if (*p == ',') *p = ' ';
    }

    // Output the result
    printf("%s\n", res_str);

    free(a);
    return 0;
}
